examples: He didn't give any explanation for his behavior.
Any student can participate in the competition.
Ele não deu nenhuma explicação para seu comportamento.
Qualquer aluno pode participar da competição.

suggested: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything! (anyone laughing?)
The thought of not having any options or choices can be disheartening.
It's frustrating when people don't give any effort or thought to their actions or decisions.
Did you know that 'any' is one of the most commonly used words in the English language?
There's no specific smell associated with 'any', but the scent of possibilities can be invigorating.
The physical sensation of having any choice or option can be empowering.
The concept of any can be connected to the idea of abundance, freedom, and endless possibilities.
